steps.name: Aphrodite - Aries
steps.description: The universe is a cruel, uncaring void. The key to being happy isn't a search for meaning. It's to just keep yourself busy with unimportant nonsense, and eventually, you'll be dead

steps.name: Aphrodite - Libra
steps.description: I need to go take a shower so I can't tell if I'm crying or not

steps.name: Hades - Virgo
steps.description: For a lot of people, life is just one long, hard kick in the urethra

steps.name: Hermes - Aries
steps.description: The universe is a cruel, uncaring void. The key to being happy isn't a search for meaning. It's to just keep yourself busy with unimportant nonsense, and eventually, you'll be dead

steps.name: Apollo - Cancer
steps.description: Spaghetti or not, here I come

steps.name: Aphrodite - Gemini
steps.description: Ow, crap. I hate this. Running is terrible. Everything is the worst

steps.name: Athena - Sagittarius
steps.description: Not understanding that you're a horrible person doesn't make you less of a horrible person

steps.name: Artemis - Cancer
steps.description: If you care about what other people think, you're never gonna do anything

steps.name: Dionysus - Pisces
steps.description: I do love you, by the way. I mean as much as I'm capable of loving anyone

steps.name: Apollo - Capricorn
steps.description: I do love you, by the way. I mean as much as I'm capable of loving anyone

steps.name: Zeus - Aquarius
steps.description: Not understanding that you're a horrible person doesn't make you less of a horrible person

steps.name: Hera - Taurus
steps.description: It gets easier. But you have to do it every day, that's the hard part. But it does get easier

steps.name: Demeter - Leo
steps.description: You know what the problem is with everybody? They all just want to hear what they already believe. No one ever wants to hear the truth

steps.name: Artemis - Virgo
steps.description: It gets easier. But you have to do it every day, that's the hard part. But it does get easier

steps.name: Aphrodite - Aries
steps.description: Dead on the inside, dead on the outside

steps.name: Zeus - Leo
steps.description: That's the problem with life, either you know what you want and you don't get what you want, or you get what you want and then you don't know what you want

steps.name: Poseidon - Pisces
steps.description: If you care about what other people think, you're never gonna do anything
